participant_1.background:
I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
I enjoyed listening to my neighbors' conversations while I was mountain biking last year.
i just want my voice to be heard.
i enjoy eating italian food.
I am often in pain so I read to distract myself.

I'd brag about how good my cake baking skills are.
I enjoy working out and staying active, even though my work life is boring.
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.
i work as an extra for major motion pictures.
i have always wanted to travel to ireland or puerto rico.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Good, thank you for asking!  How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks!  I'm just hanging out, reading a book.
I'm reading a book about psychology.  I'm really interested in learning more about human behavior.
That's really interesting!  I've always been fascinated by psychology too.
It's really interesting to learn about how people think and why they make the choices they do.
I agree!  I think it's important to understand why people do the things they do, so that we can be more understanding and compassionate towards them.
Me too!  I think it's also important to understand ourselves better, so that we can make better choices in our own lives.
That's a great point!  I think everyone could benefit from learning more about psychology.
I agree!  I think it's a really important subject.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I like to do similar things.
I also like to bake cakes!
Oh, that's awesome!  I'm not very good at baking, but I love to eat cake!
I'm sure you'd be great at it if you tried!
Maybe I will try it sometime
